akn:content.akn:p: §§ 3121 to 3130. Omitted Editorial Notes Codification Sections were omitted in the general amendment of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, Pub. L. 89–10, by Pub. L. 103–382, title I, § 101, Oct. 20, 1994, 108 Stat. 3519. Section 3121, Pub. L. 89–10, title IV, § 4401, as added Pub. L. 100–297, title I, § 1001, Apr. 28, 1988, 102 Stat. 242, provided that this part could be cited as the “Emergency Immigrant Education Act of 1984”. A prior section 3121, Pub.
